document_data.name: Alert Vigil
document_data.mainbody: '''''Alert vigil''''' was a [[divine]] spell that caused an individual to remain focused and attentive for a number of minutes.
document_data.Effects: Despite their level of fatigue or exhaustion, an individual affected by ''alert vigil'' remained mentally sharp and vigilant for the spell's duration. The effects of the spell lasted for at least an hour, but was extended longer depending the power of the [[cleric]].
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed upon one of the metal plates found on the reverse side of the ''[[Veloghon of Vigilance]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
